mapper.select: SELECT INCOME_CLASSFICATION, WITHHOLDING_YEAR, DATE_OF_CREATION, EMP_CODE, OTHER_BENEFITS_ITEM, OTHER_BENEFITS_AMOUNT, NAME, RESIDENT_STATE, RRN, SALARY_AMOUNT, BONUS_AMOUNT, START_EMP_CONTRACT_PERIOD, END_EMP_CONTRACT_PERIOD, POST_CODE, ADDRESS, JOB_DESCRIPTION, START_BREAK_TIME, END_BREAK_TIME, WORKING_DAY, DAY_OFF, SALARY_TYPE, OTHER_BENEFITS, BONUS_PAYMENT_STATUS, SALARY_PAYMENT_DATE_TYPE, PAYMENT_DATE, PAYMENT_METHOD, EMP_INSURANCE, COMPENSATION_INSURANCE, NATIONAL_PENSION, HEALTH_INSURANCE FROM SWSM
mapper.update: update swsm set income_classfication=(#{incomeClassfication}), withholding_year=(#{withholdingYear}), date_of_creation=(#{dateOfCreation}), emp_code=(#{empCode}), other_benefits_item=(#{otherBenefitsItem}), other_benefits_amount=(#{otherBenefitsAmount}), name=(#{name}), resident_state=(#{residentState}), rrn=(#{rrn}), salary_amount=(#{salaryAmount}), bonus_amount=(#{bonusAmount}), start_emp_contract_period=(#{startEmpContractPeriod}), end_emp_contract_period=(#{endEmpContractPeriod}), post_code=(#{postCode}), address=(#{address}), job_description=(#{jobDescription}), start_break_time=(#{startBreakTime}), end_break_time=(#{endBreakTime}), working_day=(#{workingDay}), day_off=(#{dayOff}), salary_type=(#{salaryType}), other_benefits=(#{otherBenefits}), bonus_payment_status=(#{bonusPaymentStatus}), salary_payment_date_type=(#{salaryPaymentDateType}), payment_date=(#{paymentDate}), payment_method=(#{paymentMethod}), emp_insurance=(#{empInsurance}), compensation_insurance=(#{compensationInsurance}), national_pension=(#{nationalPension}), health_insurance=(#{healthInsurance}) where emp_code = (#{empCode})
update swsm set name='lee' where emp_code = (#{empCode})
